column1: In terms of section 5 (1) (a) of the PTA,

column2: Any person who knowing or having reasonable cause to believe that
any  person  is  making  preparation  or  is  attempting  to  commit  an
offence under this Act, fails to report the same to a police officer shall

column1: be  guilty  of  an  offence  and  shall  on  conviction,  be

column2: imprisonment either description for a period not exceeding 07 years.
